link_name: DFS Replication for Zabbix 2.2 and above
link_desc:
UPD (v1.0.3):

  • LLD script: non-ASCII characters issue fixed
  • User macros removed from item names

UPD (v1.0.2):

  • Improvements for 'DFSR volume state': description, 'Auto Recovery' trigger and value map added
  • Some minor improvements for backlog LLD

UPD (v1.0.1):

  • Value mappings added
  • "Value is too small or too large" issue of performance counters fixed
  • Graph prototype for backlogs added
  • Some item prototyes which were disabled by default became enabled

Features:

  • A lot of metrics and triggers for monitoring and troubleshooting DFSR
  • Customization via macros
  • Descriptions and useful KB links for items and triggers
  • Does NOT require DFS management console to be installed (RSAT-DFS-Mgmt-Con)
  • Works with various Windows localizations
  • Some metrics are disabled by default to minimize server load and network traffic

Read more on GitHub
author: Nikolay Proskuryakov
